b985d79f12b7110e9b1e13dd437b25ebd40be551.commit.message:
Adapted PropertiesConfigurationLayout to new event mechanism.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1609794 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
b985d79f12b7110e9b1e13dd437b25ebd40be551.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

f23d57eae35b5f0ff44109065e303a743fcff109.commit.message:
Added an alternative method for querying event listeners.

The new method is more generic and allows filtering by an event type. The old
method for querying configuration listeners has been deprecated.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1609793 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
f23d57eae35b5f0ff44109065e303a743fcff109.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

015f1362ec11ec4c30c49514b42b25d862eac90c.commit.message:
Implemented methods for new event handlers in BaseEventSource.

Adapted event handling in AbstractConfiguration and made the base test for
event handling run again.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1609791 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
015f1362ec11ec4c30c49514b42b25d862eac90c.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

25123334009c01f8b7e1130e9f966e5c8232ecd5.commit.message:
Modified EventSource interface.

New methods for adding and removing event listeners were added based on the
event type. The existing methods were deperecated. This commit breaks the
build because not all adaptations have been made.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1609790 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
25123334009c01f8b7e1130e9f966e5c8232ecd5.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

7e8559b8e3f84bdf1acad71e4ffce4a448a436c1.commit.message:
Added methods to EventListenerList for querying registered event listeners.

This is mainly useful in unit tests, but also supports advanced iteration over
event listeners.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1609789 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
7e8559b8e3f84bdf1acad71e4ffce4a448a436c1.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

036ecdffae37f5dcbbbe9e7f7626de5eaa9bd932.commit.message:
Added new event type constants for basic update events.

A new test class was added to check whether the types are correctly set up.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1609788 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
036ecdffae37f5dcbbbe9e7f7626de5eaa9bd932.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

c6eeedbeb8240cc9ccde667c61c3c5f8266805be.commit.message:
Reworked ConfigurationEvent to conform to the new event mechanism.

The class now extends Event and can handle an EventType. The old numeric type
is still stored; it will be removed when the refactoring is complete.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1609787 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
c6eeedbeb8240cc9ccde667c61c3c5f8266805be.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

8090863a37bdb89c24fe2a38c4ddcf4cd5dcb3f1.commit.message:
Removed obsolete ReloadingListener interface.

The interface is now replaced by the generic EventListener interface.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1609786 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
8090863a37bdb89c24fe2a38c4ddcf4cd5dcb3f1.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

82e3d6431f696403b2fc4363e7699ed0ef8c4a9c.commit.message:
Removed deprecated event handling methods from ReloadingController.

All callers of these methods have been adapted; so they are now obsolete and
can be removed.
